summary: BuildRequest contains no explicit requirements. The diff modifies the app footer and updates two meta/summary files. These changes appear to introduce new UI content/branding/attribution not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer updated to include pulsing heart icon and an external attribution link to caffeine.ai, plus changing/setting the copyright year to 2026.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specifies no requirements and explicitly states a non-goal of adding new product features beyond verifying/fixing existing functionality. The footer attribution/link and styling changes are new UI content rather than a demonstrated bug fix in the diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Project meta/state and frontend file summaries updated with additional narrative about renaming to "MR.AI UMPIRE" and deployment permanence requests.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request updating project metadata files or documenting new feature requests; it only asks to verify/fix issues and lists constraints/non-goals. These edits are not tied to any specified requirement.
